children.subject:
As a senior studying EECS, and a Haas Scholar, I can vouch that Haas Scholars program has been one of the most engaging and useful experience for me during my undergrad!

Also feel free to email me with any questions regarding Haas Scholars at gnoahn.int at berkeley.edu

history.content:
Haas applications due Feb 20.  Great program.  http://hsp.berkeley.edu

Rose Hills SURF applications due Feb 22.  I had two great undergrad researchers

working with me last summer on this program.  One of them just got back from Ireland

(trip paid by me) where he presented his research at a premier conference.

There are many other opportunities listed here

http://research.berkeley.edu/opportunities/discipline?field_discipline_value=Math-Science-Engineering

ksjp
history.subject: SURF and Haas Scholars undergrad research funding deadlines
